channel.title: RuneScape HD F2P Release
channel.description:
RuneScape HD is now available to free players, and it's less than spectacular in my opinion. Full screen is members only (no surprise). Any chance it would be possible to hook the "fullscreen" field and just force the client into fullscreen mode regardless of the "isMember" field's value? Ofc, Jagex might have put in various checks, which would make it a lot harder, but still feasible.
What do you think, semaphore?

item.title: RuneScape HD F2P Release
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

On another topic

All the members said it was really good, but I was disappointed too when I just had a look…

It’s only good fullscreen, the graphic updates just make fullscreen look nice.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape HD F2P Release
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Full screen is a major improvement, but the update was nothing special, but still is a nice improvement.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape HD F2P Release
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

About the fullscreen part you were talking about, I’m pretty sure it’s possible judging by the looks of how they implemented it. Then again, I only glanced at it for a few minutes.

Read full topic
